GameOverException - Exception in general
Thrown when the game ends to exit the loop.

Creates the exception with a reason why the game ended.
general - package general
 
getCaptures(Piece[][], int[]) - Method in class checkers.CheckerPiece
Finds all valid moves for the piece at current on board where a piece is captured.

Gets the color of this piece.
getColor() - Method in class general.Player
Gets the color of this player's pieces, used to validate moves.

Gets the diagonals for this side, primarily used for checkers.

getOpposite() - Method in enum general.Side
Gets the side opposite this one.
getPanel() - Method in class general.Board
Gets a JPanel which can be used in a GUI to display the current state of the board.
